title: SPP-R400 - 4 inch (USB / Wifi / Bluetooth / Serial)
summary: Robust and Powerful 4 inch Thermal mPOS-ible Mobile Printer∙ iPad, iPhone, iOS mobile printer (MFi certified, iOS SDK supported)∙ Android mobile printer (Android SDK supported)∙ Linerless mobile label printer (optional)∙ Bluetooth, WiFi connectivit-Warranty - 1 Year
specs: Product Description DetailsUsed for∙ Customer receipt∙ Work order∙ Direct Store Delivery note∙ Tax collection∙ Line busting∙ Taxi / Train fare receipt∙ Shelf labels∙ Instant price tag label∙ Parking citation / Traffic violation ticket∙ Evidence labelsEnhanced Convenience· Compatible with mobile devices including iPhone, iPad (MFi certified),and Android· Place entire device on cradle for an effortless charge· Versatile mobile connectivity (WLAN, Bluetooth, etc.)· One touch cover open and simple drop-in paper loadingMobile Field-Work Optimization· Handy yet robust design· Water and dust resistant (IP54 with protective case)· Long-lasting battery life· Optional Integrated Card Reader (MSR)Improved Printing Performance· Linerless mobile label printing (optional)· Easily switch from receipt to label printing· Low-temp (-15°C) printing with an integrated temperature sensor· Faster printing speeds of up to 80 mm/sec (Receipt)· Enhanced printing of fonts, graphics, and barcode symbologies
